entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Providence
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -39.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Providence 1:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Temperature: -39.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 104.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -44

Wind: NW 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 36.
